question: Which among the following was not a Pre-Indian National Congress Organization?
explanation: Servants of India Society was formed in Pune, Maharashtra, on June 12, 1905 by Gopal Krishna Gokhale along with Natesh Appaji Dravid, Gopal Krishna Deodhar and Anant Patwardhan. Objective of this society was to promote social and human development and overthrow the British rule in India.
